column2: British PM Cameron vows to hunt down 'Jihadi John' LONDON British Prime Minister David Cameron vowed on Friday to use all means at his disposal to hunt down militants such as "Jihadi John" after the killer was identified as a Kuwaiti-born computer programming graduate from London. | Video  ~UPDATE 1-Lenovo to allay security concerns with free McAfee LiveSafe Feb 27 China's Lenovo Group Ltd on Friday said it will offer free subscriptions to Intel Corp  security software to customers who bought laptops that were shipped with a program known as "Superfish
